casebody.data:
Toledo Bar Association v. Rust.

[Cite as Toledo Bar Assn. v. Rust (1996), 74 Ohio St.3d 635.]

(No. 95-2128 Submitted December 6, 1995 Decided February 28, 1996.) *637Joseph L. Wittenberg; Paul D. Giha; Frank W. Cubboh, Jr. & Associates and Guy T. Barone, for relator. Marshall & Melhom and Richard M. Kerger, for respondent. Per Curiam.

Upon review of the record, we concur in the board’s findings of misconduct, but we consider public reprimand a sufficient sanction. Respondent is therefore publicly reprimanded for his violations of DR 5-105(A) and (B) and 9-102(A). Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Wright, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur. Douglas and Resnick, JJ., not participating.
